How to Install ksysguardd on debian

  • Home
  • debian
  • ksysguardd

Today in this tutorial, I’ll show you how you can install ksysguardd on debian with and without using the command line.

Introduction

Installing ksysguardd on debian is very easy. And with the help of this tutorial, you will be able to easily install, update and uninstall ksysguardd in just a few steps.

In this tutorial I’ll show you four methods to install ksysguardd, the methods are using apt, apt-get, aptitude, and synaptic. All these methods require you to have an active and stable internet connection and sudo permission.

Install ksysguardd Using apt

To install ksysguardd in debian using apt, you will need to run the apt update command first to get the updated list of packages from the repositories.

Copy the command given below and paste it in the command line, then press enter. If you are using the sudo command for the first time then you might also need to enter your root password.

sudo apt update

After you have updated the package list using apt, you can now install ksysguardd using the apt install command. To do that use the command given below.

sudo apt -y install ksysguardd

The installation of ksysguardd might take a little bit of time depending upon your internet connection and machine configuration.

Install ksysguardd Using apt-get

To install ksysguardd using apt-get in debian, you will need to first update the package list using the apt-get update command. Copy, paste, and enter the command given below in the command line.

sudo apt-get update

After updating the package lists, use the apt-get install command given below to install ksysguardd.

sudo apt-get -y install ksysguardd

Install ksysguardd Using Synaptic

To install ksysguardd using Synaptic you will need to first install Synaptic, you can do that by following the instructions from here. After installing synaptic follow the steps below to install ksysguardd on your debian using Synaptic.

You can open synaptic by clicking on the menu icon then searching for synaptic or you can open the command line and enter the command given below –

sudo synaptic

After synaptic opens, click on the search icon and search for ksysguardd. This will display the ksysguardd package in the package window, now to install ksysguardd, click on the checkbox that is on the left side.

Then click on Mark for Installation, this will select the ksysguardd package for installation, now to install it click on the Apply button, you will get a summary window where click on the apply button again to start the download of ksysguardd.

If the download and installation are successful then the checkmark option will turn green.

Install ksysguardd Using aptitude

To install ksysguardd on debian using aptitude, you will need to first install Aptitude in your debian. To install Aptitude follow the instructions here. Once you have aptitude installed proceed to the installation of ksysguardd.

Now you will need to first update your package lists from the repositories, use the apt update command for that, after that update the package list of aptitude using the aptitude update command.

sudo apt update sudo aptitude update

After updating the package list of aptitude, install ksysguardd using the command aptitude install ksysguardd.

sudo aptitude -y install ksysguardd

How to Upgrade ksysguardd on debian

If you want to upgrade the ksysguardd package on your debian to its latest version then here’s how you can do that using apt, apt-get, aptitude, and synaptic.

Upgrade ksysguardd using Apt & Apt-get

To upgrade ksysguardd to its latest version using apt or apt-get, you will need to open the terminal then run the sudo apt update command to update the package list, after that copy and paste the commands given below to upgrade ksysguardd.

sudo apt install --only-upgrade ksysguardd sudo apt-get install --only-upgrade ksysguardd

Upgrade ksysguardd using Aptitude

To upgrade ksysguardd using aptitude you will need to again run the update command to update the package list, use command sudo aptitude update to do that. After that run the command given below to upgrade ksysguardd.

sudo aptitude -y full-upgrade ksysguardd

Upgrade ksysguardd using Synaptic

To upgrade ksysguardd using synaptic open synaptic using the command sudo synaptic or by going to the menu and searching for synaptic.

In synaptic click on the reload button, this will look for updates. After that you will need to search for ksysguardd, now right-click ksysguardd, and click on the mark for upgrade option.

Now to upgrade ksysguardd just click on the apply button, then click on the apply button again in the summary screen.

How To Uninstall ksysguardd on debian

If you want to remove and uninstall ksysguardd from your debian then here’s how you can do that. To remove just ksysguardd, you can use the command that is given below, copy the command, paste it in the command line then press enter.

sudo apt remove ksysguardd

Remove related packages, dependencies & configuration files of ksysguardd

To remove all the related packages, dependencies and configuration files of ksysguardd you can use the command given below.

sudo apt -y purge ksysguardd

Remove ksysguardd using Synaptic Package Manager

You can also uninstall ksysguardd using the synaptic package manager, first open synaptic using the command sudo synaptic or search and open it directly.

After that in synaptic search for ksysguardd, right-click the ksysguardd package and click on the Mark for Complete Removal option. Now to uninstall ksysguardd click on the apply button then in summary click on apply again.

Conclusion

That is how you can install ksysguardd on debian using the command line or using the synaptic package manager. I also showed you how you can uninstall and upgrade ksysguardd using the command line or using the synaptic package manager.

If you need any help regarding the installation of ksysguardd then send me a mail at netmikoblog@gmail.com, thank you.
